text: The Didube Pantheon () is a cemetery in Tbilisi, Georgia, where some of the most prominent writers, artists, scholars, scientists and political activists of Georgia are buried. It was opened in 1939. The pantheon is located in the Didube District. == Related pages == * Mtatsminda Pantheon * Saburtalo Pantheon Category:Cemeteries Category:Buildings and structures in Asia Category:Tbilisi
title: Didube Pantheon
